item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 1st August
item.description:
28 day with road closure due to road width please cut back overgrown brambles obstructing the carriageway back to boundary approx 50m x 1m x 2.5m (Overgrown Hedge)

item.title: Outside children play area, Cleevelands, 1st August
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 1st August
item.description:

item.title: Multiple potholes in the road, 1st August
item.description:
There are multiple smallish but deep potholes in the road which I hit on my push bike last night causing me to almost fall off. I could not see the potholes as the road was completely flooded.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colwell Avenue, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 1st August
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 277 priors road, 1st August
item.description:

item.title: Pavement eroded, kerb edge protrudes 1 - 2 inches, 31st July
item.description:
The pavement outside 59 Rosehill Street is eroded and has loose surface, the kerb now protrudes 1 - 2 inches for around 3m+ length. The erosion has occured over many years but as the surface appears to be loose seems to be eroding more quickly. The protruding kerb is now a tripping hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Rosehill Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
